love

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • love.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the detail of an individual playing the game of Love Letter. This includes whether the player is still in the round, the card(s) in their hand, location in the play order, and what this player knows about what has been played and other player's hands as well as whether this player is under the protection of the Handmaid.
    Author:
    wdumas
